title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.231 - Replacement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.231 - Replacement

State Regulations

The substitution of one fixed asset for another, particularly of a new asset for an old, or of a new part for an old part. On
the books of account, the recognition of the cost of the new asset requires the
elimination of the cost of the asset it replaces. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.231

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
